pr_title: KOGITO-1337: [DMN Designer] Author and filename are always non defined

timeline.message: KOGITO-1337: [DMN Designer] Author and filename are always non defined

timeline.bodyText: I changed the methods used by the DMNDocumentation.create(...) method to protected to allow them to be overridden more easily in the future.. if ever needed. At the moment I only override getCurrentUserName().
timeline.author: manstis
jomarko

replies.bodyText: We sort of do.... Mustache (the template library used to generate the documentation) has some lovely syntax to handle null.
replies.author: manstis
